Surfline | Huntington Beach, CA | ONSITE | Full-time

Surfline/Wavetrak, Inc. specializes in providing live and predicted ocean weather information, editorial content, and consulting services to consumers, businesses, and government agencies worldwide.

----

Senior iOS Engineer https://Surfline.applytojob.com/apply/0FAlek/Sr-Ios-Engineer...

We are hiring our very first dedicated Senior iOS Engineer! In this role you will be taking ownership of Surfline’s very successful iOS app. You will work with Product Managers and Designers to implement some incredibly exciting, important and technically challenging features for our users. Being the maintainer of our iOS app puts you at the center of our iOS strategy. You should have great communication skills and have a dogged determination to find the solution to any technical challenge. "It’s not possible" isn’t in your vocabulary. You will be critical to our continued success on iOS.
